dn9:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
dn9:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena poṭṭhapādo paribbājako samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṃ tiṃsamattehi paribbājakasatehi.
dn9:1.4: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
dn9:2.3: Yannūnāhaṃ yena samayappavādako tindukācīro ekasālako mallikāya ārāmo, yena poṭṭhapādo paribbājako tenupasaṅkameyyan”ti.
dn9:2.4: Atha kho bhagavā yena samayappavādako tindukācīro ekasālako mallikāya ārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
dn9:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena poṭṭhapādo paribbājako mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṃ nisinno hoti unnādiniyā uccāsaddamahāsaddāya anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentiyā.
dn9:3.2: Seyyathidaṃ—rājakathaṃ corakathaṃ mahāmattakathaṃ senākathaṃ bhayakathaṃ yuddhakathaṃ annakathaṃ pānakathaṃ vatthakathaṃ sayanakathaṃ mālākathaṃ gandhakathaṃ ñātikathaṃ yānakathaṃ gāmakathaṃ nigamakathaṃ nagarakathaṃ janapadakathaṃ itthikathaṃ sūrakathaṃ visikhākathaṃ kumbhaṭṭhānakathaṃ pubbapetakathaṃ nānattakathaṃ lokakkhāyikaṃ samuddakkhāyikaṃ itibhavābhavakathaṃ iti vā.
dn9:4.1: Addasā kho poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ;
dn9:4.5: Appasaddakāmo kho so āyasmā appasaddassa vaṇṇavādī.
dn9:4.6: Appeva nāma appasaddaṃ parisaṃ viditvā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti.
dn9:4.7: Evaṃ vutte, te paribbājakā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
dn9:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā yena poṭṭhapādo paribbājako tenupasaṅkami.
dn9:5.2: Atha kho poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
dn9:5.5: Cirassaṃ kho, bhante, bhagavā imaṃ pariyāyamakāsi, yadidaṃ idhāgamanāya.
dn9:5.6: Nisīdatu, bhante, bhagavā, idaṃ āsanaṃ paññattan”ti.
dn9:5.8: Poṭṭhapādopi kho paribbājako aññataraṃ nīcaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
dn9:5.9: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho poṭṭhapādaṃ paribbājakaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
dn9:5.10: “kāya nuttha, poṭṭhapāda, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
dn9:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
dn9:6.2: “tiṭṭhatesā, bhante, kathā, yāya mayaṃ etarahi kathāya sannisinnā.
dn9:6.3: Nesā, bhante, kathā bhagavato dullabhā bhavissati pacchāpi savanāya.
dn9:6.4: Purimāni, bhante, divasāni purimatarāni, nānātitthiyānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ kotūhalasālāya sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ abhisaññānirodhe kathā udapādi:
dn9:6.8: Yasmiṃ samaye uppajjanti, saññī tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.9: Yasmiṃ samaye nirujjhanti, asaññī tasmiṃ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.12: ‘na kho pana metaṃ, bho, evaṃ bhavissati.
dn9:6.15: Yasmiṃ samaye upeti, saññī tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.16: Yasmiṃ samaye apeti, asaññī tasmiṃ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.19: ‘na kho pana metaṃ, bho, evaṃ bhavissati.
dn9:6.20: Santi hi, bho, samaṇabrāhmaṇā mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā.
dn9:6.21: Te imassa purisassa saññaṃ upakaḍḍhantipi apakaḍḍhantipi.
dn9:6.22: Yasmiṃ samaye upakaḍḍhanti, saññī tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.23: Yasmiṃ samaye apakaḍḍhanti, asaññī tasmiṃ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.26: ‘na kho pana metaṃ, bho, evaṃ bhavissati.
dn9:6.27: Santi hi, bho, devatā mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā.
dn9:6.28: Tā imassa purisassa saññaṃ upakaḍḍhantipi apakaḍḍhantipi.
dn9:6.29: Yasmiṃ samaye upakaḍḍhanti, saññī tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.30: Yasmiṃ samaye apakaḍḍhanti, asaññī tasmiṃ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.32: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃyeva ārabbha sati udapādi:
dn9:6.33: ‘aho nūna bhagavā, aho nūna sugato, yo imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sukusalo’ti.
dn9:6.34: Bhagavā, bhante, kusalo, bhagavā pakataññū abhisaññānirodhassa.
dn9:6.35: Kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, abhisaññānirodho hotī”ti?
dn9:7.2: ‘ahetū appaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī’ti, āditova tesaṃ aparaddhaṃ.
dn9:7.4: Sahetū hi, poṭṭhapāda, sappaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipi.
dn9:7.5: Sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:7.7: “Idha, poṭṭhapāda, tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ, sammāsambuddho …pe…
dn9:7.8: Evaṃ kho, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti …pe…
dn9:8.1: tassime pañcanīvaraṇe pahīne attani samanupassato pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
dn9:9-10.1: So vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi, savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
dn9:9-10.2: Tassa yā purimā kāmasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:9-10.3: Vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṃ samaye hoti, vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:9-10.4: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:11.1: “Puna caparaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
dn9:11.2: Tassa yā purimā vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:11.3: Samādhijapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṃ samaye hoti, samādhijapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:11.4: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:12.1: “Puna caparaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
dn9:12.2: Tassa yā purimā samādhijapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:12.3: Upekkhāsukhasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṃ samaye hoti, upekkhāsukhasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:12.4: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:13.1: “Puna caparaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
dn9:13.2: Tassa yā purimā upekkhāsukhasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:13.3: Adukkhamasukhasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṃ samaye hoti, adukkhamasukhasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:13.4: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:14.1: “Puna caparaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
dn9:14.2: Tassa yā purimā rūpasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:14.3: Ākāsānañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṃ samaye hoti, ākāsānañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:14.4: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:15.1: “Puna caparaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
dn9:15.2: Tassa yā purimā ākāsānañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:15.3: Viññāṇañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṃ samaye hoti, viññāṇañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:15.4: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:16.1: “Puna caparaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
dn9:16.2: Tassa yā purimā viññāṇañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:16.3: Ākiñcaññāyatanasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṃ samaye hoti, ākiñcaññāyatanasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hoti.
dn9:16.4: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:17.1: “Yato kho, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu idha sakasaññī hoti, so tato amutra tato amutra anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusati.
dn9:17.4: Ahañceva kho pana ceteyyaṃ, abhisaṅkhareyyaṃ, imā ca me saññā nirujjheyyuṃ, aññā ca oḷārikā saññā uppajjeyyuṃ;
dn9:17.5: yannūnāhaṃ na ceva ceteyyaṃ na ca abhisaṅkhareyyan’ti.
dn9:17.6: So na ceva ceteti, na ca abhisaṅkharoti.
dn9:17.7: Tassa acetayato anabhisaṅkharoto tā ceva saññā nirujjhanti, aññā ca oḷārikā saññā na uppajjanti.
dn9:18.2: api nu te ito pubbe evarūpā anupubbābhisaññānirodhasampajānasamāpatti sutapubbā”ti?
dn9:18.4: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavato bhāsitaṃ ājānāmi:
dn9:18.5: ‘yato kho, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu idha sakasaññī hoti, so tato amutra tato amutra anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusati,
dn9:18.8: Ahañceva kho pana ceteyyaṃ abhisaṅkhareyyaṃ, imā ca me saññā nirujjheyyuṃ, aññā ca oḷārikā saññā uppajjeyyuṃ;
dn9:18.9: yannūnāhaṃ na ceva ceteyyaṃ, na ca abhisaṅkhareyyan”ti.
dn9:18.10: So na ceva ceteti, na cābhisaṅkharoti, tassa acetayato anabhisaṅkharoto tā ceva saññā nirujjhanti, aññā ca oḷārikā saññā na uppajjanti.
dn9:19.1: “Ekaññeva nu kho, bhante, bhagavā saññaggaṃ paññapeti, udāhu puthūpi saññagge paññapetī”ti?
dn9:19.2: “Ekampi kho ahaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, saññaggaṃ paññapemi, puthūpi saññagge paññapemī”ti.
dn9:19.3: “Yathā kathaṃ pana, bhante, bhagavā ekampi saññaggaṃ paññapeti, puthūpi saññagge paññapetī”ti?
dn9:19.4: “Yathā yathā kho, poṭṭhapāda, nirodhaṃ phusati tathā tathāhaṃ saññaggaṃ paññapemi.
dn9:19.5: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, ekampi saññaggaṃ paññapemi, puthūpi saññagge paññapemī”ti.
dn9:20.1: “Saññā nu kho, bhante, paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇaṃ, udāhu ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā saññā, udāhu saññā ca ñāṇañca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjantī”ti?
dn9:20.2: “Saññā kho, poṭṭhapāda, paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇaṃ, saññuppādā ca pana ñāṇuppādo hoti.
dn9:20.5: Iminā kho etaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ—
dn9:20.6: yathā saññā paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇaṃ, saññuppādā ca pana ñāṇuppādo hotī”ti.
dn9:21.1: “Saññā nu kho, bhante, purisassa attā, udāhu aññā saññā añño attā”ti?
dn9:21.3: “Oḷārikaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, attānaṃ paccemi rūpiṃ cātumahābhūtikaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhan”ti.
dn9:21.4: “Oḷāriko ca hi te, poṭṭhapāda, attā abhavissa rūpī cātumahābhūtiko kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkho. Evaṃ santaṃ kho te, poṭṭhapāda, aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā.
dn9:21.5: Tadamināpetaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā.
dn9:21.6: Tiṭṭhateva sāyaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, oḷāriko attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkho, atha imassa purisassa aññā ca saññā uppajjanti, aññā ca saññā nirujjhanti.
dn9:21.7: Iminā kho etaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā”ti.
dn9:22.1: “Manomayaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, attānaṃ paccemi sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyan”ti.
dn9:22.2: “Manomayo ca hi te, poṭṭhapāda, attā abhavissa sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo, evaṃ santampi kho te, poṭṭhapāda, aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā.
dn9:22.3: Tadamināpetaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā.
dn9:22.4: Tiṭṭhateva sāyaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, manomayo attā sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo, atha imassa purisassa aññā ca saññā uppajjanti, aññā ca saññā nirujjhanti.
dn9:22.5: Imināpi kho etaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā”ti.
dn9:23.1: “Arūpiṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, attānaṃ paccemi saññāmayan”ti.
dn9:23.2: “Arūpī ca hi te, poṭṭhapāda, attā abhavissa saññāmayo, evaṃ santampi kho te, poṭṭhapāda, aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā.
dn9:23.3: Tadamināpetaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā.
dn9:23.4: Tiṭṭhateva sāyaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, arūpī attā saññāmayo, atha imassa purisassa aññā ca saññā uppajjanti, aññā ca saññā nirujjhanti.
dn9:23.5: Imināpi kho etaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā”ti.
dn9:24.2: ‘saññā purisassa attā’ti vā ‘aññāva saññā añño attā’ti vā”ti?
dn9:24.3: “Dujjānaṃ kho etaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, tayā aññadiṭṭhikena aññakhantikena aññarucikena aññatrāyogena aññatrācariyakena:
dn9:24.4: ‘saññā purisassa attā’ti vā, ‘aññāva saññā añño attāti’ vā”ti.
dn9:25.1: “Sacetaṃ, bhante, mayā dujjānaṃ aññadiṭṭhikena aññakhantikena aññarucikena aññatrāyogena aññatrācariyakena:
dn9:25.2: ‘saññā purisassa attā’ti vā, ‘aññāva saññā añño attā’ti vā;
dn9:25.3: kiṃ pana, bhante, ‘sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti?
dn9:26.1: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, ‘asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti?
dn9:27.7: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
dn9:27.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti?
dn9:27.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
dn9:28.2: “Na hetaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, atthasaṃhitaṃ na dhammasaṃhitaṃ nādibrahmacariyakaṃ, na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati,
dn9:29.2: “Idaṃ dukkhanti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā byākataṃ. Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā byākataṃ. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā byākataṃ. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā byākatan”ti.
dn9:30.2: “Etañhi, poṭṭhapāda, atthasaṃhitaṃ, etaṃ dhammasaṃhitaṃ, etaṃ ādibrahmacariyakaṃ, etaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati;
dn9:31.1: Atha kho te paribbājakā acirapakkantassa bhagavato poṭṭhapādaṃ paribbājakaṃ samantato vācā sannitodakena sañjhabbharimakaṃsu:
dn9:31.2: “evameva panāyaṃ bhavaṃ poṭṭhapādo yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati, taṃ tadevassa abbhanumodati:
dn9:31.4: Na kho pana mayaṃ kiñci samaṇassa gotamassa ekaṃsikaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāma:
dn9:31.5: ‘sassato loko’ti vā, ‘asassato loko’ti vā, ‘antavā loko’ti vā, ‘anantavā loko’ti vā, ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti vā, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti vā, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā”ti.
dn9:31.6: Evaṃ vutte, poṭṭhapādo paribbājako te paribbājake etadavoca:
dn9:31.7: “ahampi kho, bho, na kiñci samaṇassa gotamassa ekaṃsikaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi:
dn9:31.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā;
dn9:31.10: api ca samaṇo gotamo bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ tathaṃ paṭipadaṃ paññapeti dhammaṭṭhitataṃ dhammaniyāmataṃ.
dn9:31.11: Bhūtaṃ kho pana tacchaṃ tathaṃ paṭipadaṃ paññapentassa dhammaṭṭhitataṃ dhammaniyāmataṃ, kathañhi nāma mādiso viññū samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodeyyā”ti?
dn9:32.1: Atha kho dvīhatīhassa accayena citto ca hatthisāriputto poṭṭhapādo ca paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā citto hatthisāriputto bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
dn9:32.2: Poṭṭhapādo pana paribbājako bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
dn9:32.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
dn9:32.4: “tadā maṃ, bhante, te paribbājakā acirapakkantassa bhagavato samantato vācāsannitodakena sañjhabbharimakaṃsu:
dn9:32.5: ‘evameva panāyaṃ bhavaṃ poṭṭhapādo yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati, taṃ tadevassa abbhanumodati:
dn9:32.7: Na kho pana mayaṃ kiñci samaṇassa gotamassa ekaṃsikaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāma:
dn9:32.8: “sassato loko”ti vā, “asassato loko”ti vā, “antavā loko”ti vā, “anantavā loko”ti vā, “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran”ti vā, “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran”ti vā, “hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā’ti.
dn9:32.9: Evaṃ vuttāhaṃ, bhante, te paribbājake etadavocaṃ:
dn9:32.10: ‘ahampi kho, bho, na kiñci samaṇassa gotamassa ekaṃsikaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi:
dn9:32.12: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā;
dn9:32.13: api ca samaṇo gotamo bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ tathaṃ paṭipadaṃ paññapeti dhammaṭṭhitataṃ dhammaniyāmataṃ.
dn9:32.14: Bhūtaṃ kho pana tacchaṃ tathaṃ paṭipadaṃ paññapentassa dhammaṭṭhitataṃ dhammaniyāmataṃ, kathañhi nāma mādiso viññū samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodeyyā’”ti?
dn9:33.1: “Sabbeva kho ete, poṭṭhapāda, paribbājakā andhā acakkhukā;
dn9:33.3: Ekaṃsikāpi hi kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā dhammā desitā paññattā;
dn9:33.4: anekaṃsikāpi hi kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā dhammā desitā paññattā.
dn9:33.5: Katame ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
dn9:33.6: ‘Sassato loko’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṃsiko dhammo desito paññatto;
dn9:33.7: ‘asassato loko’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṃsiko dhammo desito paññatto;
dn9:33.13: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda …
dn9:33.14: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda …
dn9:33.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṃsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.16: Kasmā ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
dn9:33.17: Na hete, poṭṭhapāda, atthasaṃhitā na dhammasaṃhitā na ādibrahmacariyakā na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattanti.
dn9:33.18: Tasmā te mayā anekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā.
dn9:33.20: Katame ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
dn9:33.21: Idaṃ dukkhanti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṃsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.22: Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṃsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.23: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṃsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.24: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṃsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.25: Kasmā ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
dn9:33.26: Ete hi, poṭṭhapāda, atthasaṃhitā, ete dhammasaṃhitā, ete ādibrahmacariyakā ete nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.
dn9:33.27: Tasmā te mayā ekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā.
dn9:34.1: Santi, poṭṭhapāda, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
dn9:34.6: Te ce me evaṃ puṭṭhā ‘āmā’ti paṭijānanti.
dn9:34.8: ‘api pana tumhe āyasmanto ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ viharathā’ti?
dn9:34.11: ‘api pana tumhe āyasmanto ekaṃ vā rattiṃ ekaṃ vā divasaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ vā rattiṃ upaḍḍhaṃ vā divasaṃ ekantasukhiṃ attānaṃ sañjānāthā’ti?
dn9:34.15: “ayaṃ maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyāyā”’ti?
dn9:34.18: ‘api pana tumhe āyasmanto yā tā devatā ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ upapannā, tāsaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ saddaṃ suṇātha:
dn9:34.19: “suppaṭipannāttha, mārisā, ujuppaṭipannāttha, mārisā, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyāya;
dn9:34.20: mayampi hi, mārisā, evaṃpaṭipannā ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”’ti?
dn9:34.23: nanu evaṃ sante tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ appāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti?
dn9:34.24: “Addhā kho, bhante, evaṃ sante tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ appāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti.
dn9:35.2: ‘ahaṃ yā imasmiṃ janapade janapadakalyāṇī, taṃ icchāmi taṃ kāmemī’ti.
dn9:35.4: ‘ambho purisa, yaṃ tvaṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ icchasi kāmesi, jānāsi taṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ khattiyī vā brāhmaṇī vā vessī vā suddī vā’ti?
dn9:35.7: ‘ambho purisa, yaṃ tvaṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ icchasi kāmesi, jānāsi taṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ evaṃnāmā evaṅgottāti vā, dīghā vā rassā vā majjhimā vā kāḷī vā sāmā vā maṅguracchavī vāti, amukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā’ti?
dn9:35.10: ‘ambho purisa, yaṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi na passasi, taṃ tvaṃ icchasi kāmesī’ti?
dn9:35.13: nanu evaṃ sante tassa purisassa appāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti?
dn9:35.14: “Addhā kho, bhante, evaṃ sante tassa purisassa appāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti.

dn9:37.3: ‘ambho purisa, yassa tvaṃ pāsādassa ārohaṇāya nisseṇiṃ karosi, jānāsi taṃ pāsādaṃ puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya ucco vā nīco vā majjhimo vā’ti?

dn9:37.9: nanu evaṃ sante tassa purisassa appāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti?

dn9:40.1: Oḷārikassapi kho ahaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, attapaṭilābhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ desemi:
dn9:40.2: ‘yathāpaṭipannānaṃ vo saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā’ti.
dn9:40.3: Siyā kho pana te, poṭṭhapāda, evamassa:
dn9:40.4: ‘saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati, dukkho ca kho vihāro’ti.
dn9:40.5: Na kho panetaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
dn9:40.6: Saṅkilesikā ceva dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā ca dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati, pāmujjañceva bhavissati pīti ca passaddhi ca sati ca sampajaññañca sukho ca vihāro.

dn9:43.1: Pare ce, poṭṭhapāda, amhe evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
dn9:43.2: ‘katamo pana so, āvuso, oḷāriko attapaṭilābho, yassa tumhe pahānāya dhammaṃ desetha, yathāpaṭipannānaṃ vo saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā’ti, tesaṃ mayaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhā evaṃ byākareyyāma:
dn9:43.3: ‘ayaṃ vā so, āvuso, oḷāriko attapaṭilābho, yassa mayaṃ pahānāya dhammaṃ desema, yathāpaṭipannānaṃ vo saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā’ti.

dn9:44.2: ‘katamo pana so, āvuso, manomayo attapaṭilābho, yassa tumhe pahānāya dhammaṃ desetha, yathāpaṭipannānaṃ vo saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā’ti?
dn9:44.3: Tesaṃ mayaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhā evaṃ byākareyyāma:

dn9:45.2: ‘katamo pana so, āvuso, arūpo attapaṭilābho, yassa tumhe pahānāya dhammaṃ desetha, yathāpaṭipannānaṃ vo saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā’ti?

dn9:47.3: katamo pana so, āvuso, manomayo attapaṭilābho …pe…
dn9:47.4: katamo pana so, āvuso, arūpo attapaṭilābho, yassa tumhe pahānāya dhammaṃ desetha, yathāpaṭipannānaṃ vo saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā’ti?
dn9:47.5: Tesaṃ mayaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhā evaṃ byākareyyāma:
dn9:47.6: ‘ayaṃ vā so, āvuso, arūpo attapaṭilābho, yassa mayaṃ pahānāya dhammaṃ desema, yathāpaṭipannānaṃ vo saṅkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti, vodāniyā dhammā abhivaḍḍhissanti, paññāpāripūriṃ vepullattañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā’ti.
dn9:47.7: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, poṭṭhapāda, nanu evaṃ sante sappāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti?
dn9:47.8: “Addhā kho, bhante, evaṃ sante sappāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti.
dn9:48.1: Evaṃ vutte, citto hatthisāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
dn9:48.2: “yasmiṃ, bhante, samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābho hoti, moghassa tasmiṃ samaye manomayo attapaṭilābho hoti, mogho arūpo attapaṭilābho hoti;
dn9:48.3: oḷāriko vāssa attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ samaye sacco hoti.
dn9:48.4: Yasmiṃ, bhante, samaye manomayo attapaṭilābho hoti, moghassa tasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābho hoti, mogho arūpo attapaṭilābho hoti;
dn9:48.5: manomayo vāssa attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ samaye sacco hoti.
dn9:48.6: Yasmiṃ, bhante, samaye arūpo attapaṭilābho hoti, moghassa tasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābho hoti, mogho manomayo attapaṭilābho hoti;
dn9:48.7: arūpo vāssa attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ samaye sacco hotī”ti.
dn9:49.1: “Yasmiṃ, citta, samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābho hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye manomayo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na arūpo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
dn9:49.2: oḷāriko attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
dn9:49.3: Yasmiṃ, citta, samaye manomayo attapaṭilābho hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na arūpo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
dn9:49.4: manomayo attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
dn9:49.5: Yasmiṃ, citta, samaye arūpo attapaṭilābho hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na manomayo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
dn9:49.6: arūpo attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
dn9:49.9: bhavissasi tvaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, na tvaṃ na bhavissasi;
dn9:49.10: atthi tvaṃ etarahi, na tvaṃ natthī’ti.
dn9:49.11: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, citta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
dn9:49.13: ‘ahosi tvaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na tvaṃ na ahosi;
dn9:49.14: bhavissasi tvaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, na tvaṃ na bhavissasi;
dn9:49.15: atthi tvaṃ etarahi, na tvaṃ natthī’ti.
dn9:49.16: Evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākareyyaṃ:
dn9:49.20: Evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākareyyan”ti.
dn9:50.2: ‘yo te ahosi atīto attapaṭilābho, sova te attapaṭilābho sacco, mogho anāgato, mogho paccuppanno?
dn9:50.3: Yo te bhavissati anāgato attapaṭilābho, sova te attapaṭilābho sacco, mogho atīto, mogho paccuppanno?
dn9:50.4: Yo te etarahi paccuppanno attapaṭilābho, sova te attapaṭilābho sacco, mogho atīto, mogho anāgato’ti.
dn9:50.5: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, citta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
dn9:50.7: ‘yo te ahosi atīto attapaṭilābho, sova te attapaṭilābho sacco, mogho anāgato, mogho paccuppanno.
dn9:50.8: Yo te bhavissati anāgato attapaṭilābho, sova te attapaṭilābho sacco, mogho atīto, mogho paccuppanno.
dn9:50.9: Yo te etarahi paccuppanno attapaṭilābho, sova te attapaṭilābho sacco, mogho atīto, mogho anāgato’ti.
dn9:50.10: Evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākareyyaṃ:
dn9:50.11: ‘yo me ahosi atīto attapaṭilābho, sova me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ samaye sacco ahosi, mogho anāgato, mogho paccuppanno.
dn9:50.12: Yo me bhavissati anāgato attapaṭilābho, sova me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ samaye sacco bhavissati, mogho atīto, mogho paccuppanno.
dn9:50.13: Yo me etarahi paccuppanno attapaṭilābho, sova me attapaṭilābho sacco, mogho atīto, mogho anāgato’ti.
dn9:50.14: Evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākareyyan”ti.
dn9:51.1: “Evameva kho, citta, yasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābho hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye manomayo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na arūpo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
dn9:51.2: Oḷāriko attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
dn9:51.3: Yasmiṃ, citta, samaye manomayo attapaṭilābho hoti …pe…
dn9:51.4: yasmiṃ, citta, samaye arūpo attapaṭilābho hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na manomayo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
dn9:51.5: arūpo attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
dn9:52.1: Seyyathāpi, citta, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo.
dn9:52.2: Yasmiṃ samaye khīraṃ hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye dadhīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na navanītanti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na sappīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na sappimaṇḍoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
dn9:52.7: sappimaṇḍo hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye khīranti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na dadhīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na navanītanti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na sappīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
dn9:53.1: Evameva kho, citta, yasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābho hoti …pe…
dn9:53.2: yasmiṃ, citta, samaye manomayo attapaṭilābho hoti …pe…
dn9:53.3: yasmiṃ, citta, samaye arūpo attapaṭilābho hoti, neva tasmiṃ samaye oḷāriko attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, na manomayo attapaṭilābhoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
dn9:53.4: arūpo attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
dn9:53.5: Imā kho, citta, lokasamaññā lokaniruttiyo lokavohārā lokapaññattiyo, yāhi tathāgato voharati aparāmasan”ti.
dn9:54.1: Evaṃ vutte, poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
dn9:54.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
dn9:54.4: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
dn9:54.5: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
dn9:55.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
dn9:55.4: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
dn9:55.5: Labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
dn9:56.1: Alattha kho citto hatthisāriputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
dn9:56.2: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā citto hatthisāriputto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
dn9:56.3: “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthAttāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
dn9:56.4: Aññataro kho panāyasmā citto hatthisāriputto arahataṃ ahosīti.
